Token.Abstract: Protocol for OGWContactAspect delegates to receive contact information.
Sent when a contact with another object began.

Parameter.Name: aspect
Parameter.Abstract: The OGWContactAspect that generated the event.

Parameter.Name: contact
Parameter.Abstract: The entity with which the aspect's entity is in contact with.

Token.Abstract: Sent when a contact with another object exists. This is a continuous event that fires as long as the contact exists. Therefore avoid implementing this method when at all possible. It may be needed to continously resolve the contact, for example to ensure the two entities in contact do not intersect (or no more than a given threshold).

Parameter.Name: aspect
Parameter.Abstract: The OGWContactAspect that generated the event.

Parameter.Name: contact
Parameter.Abstract: The entity with which the aspect's entity is in contact with.

Token.Abstract: Sent when a contact with another object ended.

Parameter.Name: aspect
Parameter.Abstract: The OGWContactAspect that generated the event.

Parameter.Name: contact
Parameter.Abstract: The entity which the aspect's entity lost contact with.
